documentation.title: Declare Statements Style
documentation.standard: Declare statements should, by default, be written without curly braces/alternative syntax.

code.title: Valid: Declare statement written without curly braces.
Invalid: Declare statement written with curly braces or alternative syntax.

code.title: Valid: strict_types written without curly braces.
